Uses of Class
simulator.framework.Hallway

Packages that use Hallway
simulator.elevatorcontrol Contains classes that manipulate the simulated environmental objects. 
simulator.elevatormodules Provides sensors for detecting car position, door position, and door reversal triggers, and actuators for turning on button lights moving the doors. 
simulator.framework Provides the core infrastructure for simulating the network and elevator. 
simulator.payloads The message types that can be sent on the simulated network.
